A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie is a mixed bag for me....some things I really despised (Porgs\, BB8\, the space leprachaun & some bad humor \"Chrome Dome\") but I enjoyed how unpredictable it was. Leia was great...yes even that scene that people are complaining about....to me that was the best scene...I am glad it got rid of alot of lingering things from the previous movies....it is a very different Star Wars movie.....but still a disappointment for what it could have been
